headline: Coinbase Global (COIN) Will Acquire Derivatives Clearinghouse, The Clearing Company, Reports Bloomberg
summary: Coinbase Global, Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) is one of the High Growth Large Cap Stocks to Buy Right Now. On December 22, Bloomberg noted that the company will acquire a derivatives clearinghouse, The Clearing Company. This will be for boosting its entry into the growing prediction markets business. The acquisition is expected to help Coinbase Global, Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) expand […]

headline: Global X Blockchain ETF Is The Best Way to Bet on Blockchain In 2026 | BKCH
summary: Blockchain investing has always presented a dilemma: buy individual mining stocks and risk catastrophic losses, or spread exposure across an ETF and sacrifice some upside. The Global X Blockchain ETF (NASDAQ:BKCH) made that choice easier in 2025, gaining 31.6% year-to-date while individual miners experienced significant declines. Bitcoin currently trades just above $87,000, down 16.5% from ... Global X Blockchain ETF Is The Best Way to Bet on Blockchain In 2026 | BKCH

headline: Charles Schwab Is Back on Offense. Its Stock Is a Buy.
summary: The company’s problems of two years ago are well behind it, and shares appear poised for more gains.

headline: Coinbase Warns: Digital Dollar Policy Risks Losing Ground to e-CNY
summary: Coinbase’s Chief Policy Officer, Faryar Shirzad, issued a stark warning that the U.S. risks conceding dominance in digital finance to China over proposed stablecoin regulations. The alert comes as the People’s Bank of China (PBoC) announced it will permit interest payments on its digital yuan (e-CNY) starting January 1, 2026. ...

headline: Lighter Valuation Surpasses Pump.fun and Jupiter: Can LIT Overtake Hyperliquid?
summary: Lighter hits $2.7 billion FDV, rivaling Hyperliquid, but revenue drops 10 times, raising valuation questions for investors now.

headline: Robinhood and Coinbase battle it out for the prediction markets customer
summary: CNBC’s MacKenzie Sigalos reports on the divergence in crypto-linked stocks: Robinhood is up more than 200% year to date while Coinbase is in the red, helped by Robinhood’s early lead in one of the stickiest new products in brokerage apps — event contracts.

headline: These Stocks Are the Market’s Biggest Winners and Losers in 2025
summary: The AI trade broadened out this year, as chip stocks again led the S&P 500 but were joined by the shares of companies tied to building the data centers that will power the technology.  Three of the index’s top 10 performers in 2025 were data storage companies, which are among the main beneficiaries of the hundreds of billions of dollars in pledged spending by the giant AI cloud service providers known as hyperscalers.

headline: Robinhood leads the prediction markets race as Coinbase plays catch-up
summary: CNBC’s MacKenzie Sigalos reports on how Robinhood’s early push into event contracts is widening the stock gap as Coinbase turns to M&A to close the infrastructure gap.
